    • Citizen

      public Citizen​(java.lang.String citizenID, java.lang.String Fname, java.lang.String Mname, java.lang.String Lname, char Gender, int YOB, java.lang.String lifeStatus, java.lang.String Address1, java.lang.String Address2, java.lang.String Address3, java.lang.String Address4, java.lang.String Address5, java.lang.String dadID, java.lang.String momID)
      Used for "accepting" citizens info. A constructor for the Citizen class. Instantiate a Name object. Instantiate an Address object.
      Parameters:
      citizenID - A String representation of the citizen's ID
      Fname - The citizen's first name
      Mname - The citizen's middle name
      Lname - The citizen's last name
      Gender - The citizen's gender name
      YOB - The citizen's year of birth name
      lifeStatus - The citizen's life status - Alive/Deceased
      Address1 - The citizen's Address first line
      Address2 - The citizen's Address second line
      Address3 - The citizen's Address third line
      Address4 - The citizen's Address fourth line
      Address5 - The citizen's Address fifth line
      momID - The citizen's Mother ID
      dadID - The citizen's Father ID
